title: kraft-tex Orchid Hand-Dyed & Prewashed: Kraft Paper Fabric, 18.5” x 28.5" Roll (kraft-tex Designer)
features: DESIGNER kraft-tex: Dynamic colors of prewashed kraft-tex

Wait until you get your hands on this vibrant paper that looks, feels, and wears like leather, but sews, cuts, and washes just like fabric. kraft-tex® is supple, yet strong enough to use for projects that get tough wear. This cruelty-free leather alternative now comes in 13 hand-dyed, hand-finished colors that bring exciting new texture and color to your craft-sewing projects, mixed-media arts, and bookmaking. This sumptuous surface is pre-washed, preshrunk, eco-friendly, color-fast, tear-resistant, and so much more. Hand-dyed and prewashed in Italy!
We save you the work! No prep needed with prewashed VINTAGE kraft-tex- just start sewing and crafting

kraft-tex is versatile; durable; and a wonderful substitute for fabric, leather, or vinyl

kraft-tex can be embossed, machine embroidered, hand embroidered, distressed, inkjet printed, painted with acrylics, dyed, colored with shoe polish, waxed with paste wax, stamped, drawn on, and so much more! Cuts easily with scissors or rotary cutters

This item is a single sheet of DESIGNER kraft-tex: 18.5” x 28.5”
description: Six new hues of kraft-tex have burst onto the scene with an explosion of color. We couldn't be more excited to add these vibrant paper fabrics to our stash. The new designer line comes pre-washed, giving it a supple, suede-like feel and texture. Stamp, stitch, emboss, print, and more on this fantastic substrate. This new line comes in marsala, tangerine, greenery, turquoise, blue iris, and radiant orchid. ―
